name: @dreamistlabs/config-commitlint
description: Shareable configuration for conventional changelog commitlint
author: Johnny Hu <johnny@dreamistlabs.com>

scripts.changelog:persist: npm run changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md && cross-env HUSKY=0 git commit -m "Chore: Updated CHANGELOG.md for release"
scripts.cloc:persist: npm run cloc -- --md --out=CLOC.md && git add CLOC.md
scripts.push:tags: git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:major: cross-env HUSKY=0 npm version major && run-s changelog:persist push:tags
scripts.release:minor: cross-env HUSKY=0 npm version minor && run-s changelog:persist push:tags
scripts.release:patch: cross-env HUSKY=0 npm version patch && run-s changelog:persist push:tags
